data.eml:eml: Sarandibrinus, a new genus of Saprininae subfamily from Madagascar (Coleoptera, Histeridae) (Second contribution to the knowledge of the Histeridae of Madagascar)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lackner, Tomas, Gomy, Yves (2014): Sarandibrinus, a new genus of Saprininae subfamily from Madagascar (Coleoptera, Histeridae) (Second contribution to the knowledge of the Histeridae of Madagascar). ZooKeys 427: 109-125, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.427.4799, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.427.4799
